segment.source: How to Run the Crash Analyzer on an End-user Computer
segment.target: How to Run the Crash Analyzer on an End-user Computer

segment.source: How to Run the Crash Analyzer on an End-user Computer
segment.target: How to Run the Crash Analyzer on an End-user Computer

segment.source: How to Run the Crash Analyzer on an End-user Computer
segment.target: How to Run the Crash Analyzer on an End-user Computer

segment.source: Typically, you run Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 Crash Analyzer from the Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset window on an end-user computer that has problems.
segment.target: Typically, you run Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 Crash Analyzer from the Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset window on an end-user computer that has problems.

segment.source: The Crash Analyzer tries to locate the Debugging Tools for Windows on the problem computer.
segment.target: The Crash Analyzer tries to locate the Debugging Tools for Windows on the problem computer.

segment.source: If the directory path dialog box is empty, you must enter the location or browse to the location of the Debugging Tools for Windows (you can download the files from Microsoft).
segment.target: If the directory path dialog box is empty, you must enter the location or browse to the location of the Debugging Tools for Windows (you can download the files from Microsoft).

segment.source: You must also provide a path to where the symbol files are located.
segment.target: You must also provide a path to where the symbol files are located.

segment.source: To open and run the Crash Analyzer on an end-user computer
segment.target: To open and run the Crash Analyzer on an end-user computer

segment.source: On the Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset window on an end-user computer, click Crash Analyzer.
segment.target: On the Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset window on an end-user computer, click Crash Analyzer.

segment.source: Provide the required information for the following:
segment.target: Provide the required information for the following:

segment.source: Microsoft Debugging Tools for Windows
segment.target: Microsoft Debugging Tools for Windows

segment.source: Symbol files
segment.target: Symbol files

segment.source: For more information about symbol files, see, How to Ensure that Crash Analyzer Can Access Symbol Files.
segment.target: For more information about symbol files, see, How to Ensure that Crash Analyzer Can Access Symbol Files.

segment.source: A crash dump file
segment.target: A crash dump file

segment.source: Follow these steps to determine the location of the crash dump file:
segment.target: Follow these steps to determine the location of the crash dump file:

segment.source: Open the System Properties window.
segment.target: Open the System Properties window.

segment.source: Click Start, type sysdm.cpl, and then press Enter.
segment.target: Click Start, type sysdm.cpl, and then press Enter.

segment.source: Click the Advanced tab.
segment.target: Click the Advanced tab.

segment.source: In the Startup and Recovery area, click Settings.
segment.target: In the Startup and Recovery area, click Settings.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you do not have access to the System Properties window, you can search for dump files on the end-user computer by using the Search tool in DaRT.
segment.target: If you do not have access to the System Properties window, you can search for dump files on the end-user computer by using the Search tool in DaRT.

segment.source: The Crash Analyzer scans the crash dump file and reports a probable cause of the crash.
segment.target: The Crash Analyzer scans the crash dump file and reports a probable cause of the crash.

segment.source: You can view more information about the crash, such as the specific crash message and description, the drivers loaded at the time of the crash, and the full output of the analysis.
segment.target: You can view more information about the crash, such as the specific crash message and description, the drivers loaded at the time of the crash, and the full output of the analysis.

segment.source: Decide upon an appropriate strategy to resolve the problem.
segment.target: Decide upon an appropriate strategy to resolve the problem.

segment.source: This may require disabling or updating the device driver that caused the crash by using the Services and Drivers node of the Computer Management tool in DaRT.
segment.target: This may require disabling or updating the device driver that caused the crash by using the Services and Drivers node of the Computer Management tool in DaRT.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Diagnosing System Failures with Crash Analyzer
segment.target: Diagnosing System Failures with Crash Analyzer
